# Card Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Default

**Appearance Class:** `app-card card-default`

---

## Appearance: Filled

**Appearance Class:** `app-card card-filled`

---

## Appearance: Elevated

**Appearance Class:** `app-card card-elevated`
